channel.title: Happy Birth's For The Month Of Apirl!
channel.description:
Due to the fact that there are being millions of posts on each birth i decided to post a spot to say happy birthday to all of the Morparscape members for the month of April.
To Start off i'd love to say happy birthday to the following: Yambar, Parkview, Armend555, W W E, PvPXile, ztornado5, Exion ComputerLove, ziniasara, and last but not least Ruby.

item.title: Happy Birth's For The Month Of Apirl!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Does it matter about the birthday topic amounts? These people haven’t just turned up this year, and we’ve always had spikes in Birthday topics. If people would stop posting a Birthday topic for every person they’ve ever heard of or seen, regardless of if they even use the site we wouldn’t have a “problem”. One person shouldn’t be posting the entire months Birthday topics, and 3 people shouldn’t be trying to solve the “problem” by posting even more birthday related topics.

If people are using Birthday topics as a postcount increasing mechanism, then they will be punished and somebody else can post it. I would expect birthday topics to be posted by people the member actually knows, rather than some random guy who’s heard the name before. If one member feels the need to post a million topics a month about Birthdays then they need to stop, because I doubt you know anything about the people you’re posting and it looks awfully like you want the postcount from my end.

I have no intention of adding a new board, or changing how Birthdays have always worked to answer all those who have asked.

Read full topic
item.source: Happy Birth's For The Month Of Apirl!
